tickets.loginBeforeBuy: Please login with your Google account to buy or register a ticket.
tickets.ticketManagedByGoogleAccount: After purchase or registration, tickets will be managed by your Google account.

already_purchased_card.title: Thank you for purchasing a ticket!
already_purchased_card.description: You already have a ticket. Please check your ticket and edit your name card from the ticket page.
already_purchased_card.verify_error: An error occurred while verifying whether you have a ticket.

invitation.description: If you have an invitation code or coupon code, please enter it here.

validation.next_payment: By pressing OK, you will be redirected to Stripe. Please confirm that the promotion code is applied and purchase the ticket.
validation.next_confirm_order: By pressing OK, you will be redirected to Stripe. Please confirm that the promotion code is applied and confirm the order.

invited.title: Invitation code has been successfully validated
invited.warning: Pressing "Next" will finalize the information. If you need to make changes, please contact the organizers.

student.name: Student Discount
student.description:
If you are a student (High school, University, College of Technology(KOSEN), etc.) on the day of FlutterKaigi 2024, we will refund the full ticket price by showing your student ID on the day of this event.
 * Refunds are only valid on the day of the event. Only general tickets are eligible.

verify_purchase.processing_description: Linking your purchase record and user. Please wait a moment...
verify_purchase.error: An error occurred while verifying the purchase of the ticket.
verify_purchase.error_description: The purchase could not be completed due to an error. Please refresh the page and try again.
verify_purchase.contact: If the problem persists, please contact the organizers.

log_out_dialog.title: Are you sure you want to log out?
log_out_dialog.description: Logging out will prevent you from purchasing or registering tickets until you log in again.

googleCopyright.text0: Flutter and the related logo are trademarks of Google LLC. FlutterKaigi is not affiliated with or otherwise sponsored by Google LLC.
googleCopyright.text1: The Flutter name and the Flutter logo

thankYouCard.title: Thank you for purchasing a ticket!

warning_for_speaker_profile.title: Note on Speaker Profile
warning_for_speaker_profile.description: Speaker profiles will be published on the FlutterKaigi official site. Please be careful.

warning_for_personal_sponsor.title: Note on Personal Sponsor Profile
warning_for_personal_sponsor.description: You have a personal sponsor ticket. You can choose to publish your profile on the FlutterKaigi official site.

information_for_profile_edit.title: Note on Profile Information
information_for_profile_edit.description: The profile information you enter here will be printed on your name card at FlutterKaigi. You can edit your name, comment, X account, and profile image.

name.title: Name
name.description: Please enter your name. (20 characters or less, no special characters allowed)

validation.too_long: Name must be 20 characters or less

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Please enter your comment. (80 characters or less, no special characters allowed)

validation.too_long: Comment must be 80 characters or less

x_account.title: X Account
x_account.description: Please enter your X account. (No @ symbol allowed)

validation.too_long: X Account must be 40 characters or less

avatar.title: Profile Image
avatar.description: Please upload your profile image. (PNG, JPG format, up to 2MB)
avatar.delete_success: Profile image reset to default successfully
avatar.delete_error: Profile image reset to default failed
